Specific Details: What measures being taken regarding the impact of short-term rentals on our housing market ? It is challenging to find property to rent long term or purchase. Legislation had been approved and enacted so local authorities would have control around short term lets, yet this is not enforced or even familiar to L.A.’s or property owners across the Country.
DPOs Lobbied: Simon Coveney|Minister|Department of Foreign Affairs::John Cummins|Senator|Seanad
Subject Matter: What measures being taken regarding the impact of short-term rentals on our housing market ? It is challenging to find property to rent long term or purchase. Legislation had been approved and enacted so local authorities would have control around short term lets, yet this is not enforced or even familiar to L.A.’s or property owners across the Country.
Intended Results: Loss of less housing stock to  short trem holiday rental market and more for  residential rental or purchase
